LanguageData.PawnmorphMoo.stages.0.label: moo
LanguageData.PawnmorphBleat.stages.0.label: bleat
LanguageData.PawnmorphBok.stages.0.label: cluck
LanguageData.PawnmorphYip.stages.0.label: yip
LanguageData.PawnmorphBark.stages.0.label: bark
LanguageData.PawnmorphMeow.stages.0.label: meow
LanguageData.PawnmorphHeadpats.stages.0.label: gave headpats
LanguageData.PawnmorphHeadpatsRecipient.label: gave headpats
LanguageData.GotHeadpats.label: got headpats
LanguageData.GotHeadpats.stages.0.label: comforted about my changes
LanguageData.GotHeadpats.stages.0.description: Someone made me feel a bit better about myself. That was nice.
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: I'm covered in wool, and I really want to spit at people.
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: Wow, I'm covered in wool, and these hooves are cool!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: I never asked to become a stupid, smelly alpaca! I need to shave right now!
LanguageData.AlpacaTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: Wow. This wool is so fluffy, imagine being on all four hooves like this!
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more wool.
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: Aw man, but I was really enjoying threatening to spit at people.
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.2.descriptio: No more wool! Oh, skin, how I missed seeing you.
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.AlpacaRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.0.label: Wooly snout
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.0.description: Ew, I feel like I need to spit.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.1.label: Wooly snout
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.2.label: Wooly snout
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaSnout.stages.2.description: My face, it's so ugly and drooly!
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.0.label: Wooly ears
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.0.description: They're annoyingly long and get in the way.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.1.label: Wooly ears
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaEar.stages.2.label: Wooly ears
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.0.label: Wooly tail
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.0.description: It's dangly and in the way.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.1.label: Wooly tail
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.1.description: Cool, a tail! I suppose it's part of the aesthetic, if not all that useful.
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.2.label: Wooly tail
LanguageData.EtherAlpacaTail.stages.2.description: I think I can cut it it off, right?
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: I'm a... giant bear? What do I even do about this situation?
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: This is awesome, I'm a huge bear-person!
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: No no no! I hate everything about being a hairy bear!
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.BearTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: This is cool and all, but what about being an even bigger bear with massive clawed paws?
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more hibernating!
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying those giant claws.
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more fur! Oh, skin, how I missed seeing you.
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.BearRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.0.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.0.description: Table manners are going to be hard like this.
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.1.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.1.description: ROAR! Awesome, time to raid the freezer!
LanguageData.EtherBearMuzzle.stages.2.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.0.label: Bear ears
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.0.description: They're not the worst thing ever. It's like built-in earmuffs.
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.1.label: Bear ears
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.1.description: They're small and round, not all that impressive.
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.2.label: Bear ears
LanguageData.EtherBearEar.stages.2.description: Egh, they're so furry and awful.
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.0.label: Tiny tail
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.0.description: If I had to get a tail, why wasn't it something cool at least?
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.1.label: Tiny tail
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.1.description: As far as tails go, this is not that impressive.
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.2.label: Tiny tail
LanguageData.EtherBearTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it.
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: My dentist isn't going to be happy about this.
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: Nobody will mess with me now, not with tusks like these!
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: I'm a hideous pig! And these tusks are a nightmare to floss!
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.BoarTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: This is great, but what if I could go further and root around for truffles?
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more snuffling!
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying those tusks.
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more trotters! Hands, glorious hands!
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoarRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: Eugh... I smell like chemfuel. Not liking this so far.
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: It's a little weird, but I bet I could get used to these changes! Boom!
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.2.d: Eugh! I reek of chemfuel, and I feel like I could explode at any moment!
LanguageData.BoomalopeTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: Not bad... but it'd be fun to have four hooves on the ground... right?
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more chemfuel!
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.1.descrip: Aw man, but I was really enjoying the petrol smell.
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: No more hooves! Hands, glorious hands!
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.BoomalopeRevertedMemory.stages.3.descrip: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.0.label: Petrol snout
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.0.description: Perfect for one thing, eating grass.
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.1.label: Petrol snout
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.2.label: Petrol snout
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeSnout.stages.2.description: No, I don't want to eat grass, stop thinking about it!
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.0.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.0.description: My ears? What do you mean something is wrong with my ears?
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.1.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.EtherBoomalopeEar.stages.2.label: Petrol ears
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I'm... a cat? No, don't pet me. I do have claws and I will cut you.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: Cat? I'm a kitty cat! And I dance dance dance, and I dance dance dance.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: The world is too detailed and so bright. I keep cutting myself with these damn claws.
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: morphed
LanguageData.CatTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: Wow, the world looks so sharp, and these claws are sharp too! Imagine if I could look into all the small places on all fours!
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more fur or claws.
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying threatening to claw people.
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: No more claws! Finally, I'll stop accidentally stabbing myself.
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CatRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.EtherReactionChaosTF.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.EtherReactionChaosTF.stages.1.label: feeling chaotic
LanguageData.EtherReactionChaosTF.stages.1.descriptio: My whole body is warping before my eyes! Am I going to survive?!
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I'm... covered in feathers... OUCH! What!? Did I just lay an *egg*! Oh no...
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I'm all feathery, and these wings are nea- BWAK! What the- An egg! Neat!
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: Oh man, these feathers are disgusting, and the talons look fr- BWAK! What the — oh no... please tell me that's not an egg...
LanguageData.ChickenTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: These feathers and talons are so good, and laying eggs! If only I could just settle down in a nesting box.
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more laying eggs. Or eating eggs, please.
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: But the feathers! The *eggs*! Didn't you like the breakfast I made?
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: Hands and feet. And most important, no more eggs. EVER.
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.ChickenRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: Thessse ssscales are going to take sssome time to get ussssed to... they're kind of itchy.
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: Wow, I feel so quick and powerful like this!
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.CobraTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: Yessss... but maybe we ssshould sssee just how ssssnakelike I can be...
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Thank goodness, I missed having actual skin.
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: What?! Now I've got these lame human legs again.
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CobraRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
I'm so angry all the time now
I feel so strong, so alive
I feel like a monster, I can barely control myself
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundRevertedMemory.stages.0.desc: finially, I feel like I can relax
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundRevertedMemory.stages.1.desc: I just got used to all that strength
LanguageData.PM_HellhoundRevertedMemory.stages.3.desc: I'm so weak now, change me back!
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: I have this uncontrollable urge to pounce and hunt things.
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: I'm so sleek and svelte, this is fantastic!
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: I don't want to be a stupid big cat! I hate cats!
LanguageData.CougarTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: Meow! Now, to go the rest of the way?
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: Those claws were really getting in the way.
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: Not fair, I enjoyed feeling so sleek.
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CougarRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: This is the opposite of what I wanted.
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: Eugh, I feel so heavy all the time. I should diet.
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: It’s gotta feel so good to moo as a cow. Probably feels really good to moo.
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: Please no, I just worked off all that weight! Why!?
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.CowTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: While this is great, it'd be fun to try the full experience... right? Or maybe I'm not thinking as clearly now...
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Yeah, that was... about enough of that.
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, that was fun though. Still gonna moo for the hell of it.
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.CowRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: All the sounds are so loud, and kind of scary! AAH, was that you? Who's there?
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: I feel so graceful, like the ruler of the forest.
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: AAH! Who was that!? I heard you! Run away! I hate this!
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.DeerTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: So regal! This is great, but not quite all there yet.
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm not so jumpy all the time now, phew.
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: I could have had some nice antlers...
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: I'm sorry for being so scared all the time, everyone!
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.DeerRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Sure, take all the fun out of my life, why don't ya?
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.0.desc: I'm feeling really stubborn, and I don't want to talk to you!
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: My back has never been stronger!
LanguageData.DonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: This is awesome, I want to try pulling a cart like this.
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I can speak properly again... phew.
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: I feel so weak and feeble.
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.DonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: Aw, but I liked being that way.
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.0.de: I'm so heavy, and this trunk gets in the way.
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: Wow, this is so great I think I might let out a TOOT!
LanguageData.ElephantTransformationMemory.stages.3.de: I bet I'd be even bigger as a full elephant, you know.
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: I think I'll celebrate... with a salad.
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.ElephantRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: I feel much smaller now. This is the opposite of what I wanted!
LanguageData.ElephantFootMemory.stages.0.label: Elephant foot
LanguageData.ElephantFootMemory.stages.0.description: My feet look like stumps. At least I don't have toes to stub anymore.
LanguageData.ElephantFootMemory.stages.1.label: Elephant foot
LanguageData.ElephantFootMemory.stages.1.description: Stomp! Stomp! Stomp! I will trample my enemies!
LanguageData.ElephantFootMemory.stages.2.label: Elephant foot
LanguageData.ElephantFootMemory.stages.2.description: Curse these massive feet! I feel like I am going to put a hole in the floor.
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I feel like I need to be hunting chickens, but I don't want to!
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: YIP! This is great! Time for an egg sandwich.
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.FoxTransformationMemory.stages.3.descrip: Ooh, so sleek — it could be fun to go full fox.
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.FoxRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I was so fluffy! This isn't what I wanted!
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: My dentist is gonna hate this.
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: Grass tastes so much better now for some reason.
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: My teeth, they're so big! Gross!
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.HareTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: Nice, but imagine being picked up and hugged.
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Phew, those ears were getting in the way.
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Eugh, grass tastes gross again, no thank you!
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: MY TEETH ARE NORMAL AGAIN! REJOICE!
LanguageData.HareRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.0.label: Rabbit face
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.0.description: These whiskers and teeth are dumb.
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.1.label: Rabbit face
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.1.description: Check out my cute little button nose, I love it!
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.2.label: Rabbit face
LanguageData.EtherHareJaw.stages.2.description: I wasn't eating a leaf, you didn't see that!
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.0.label: Rabbit ears
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.0.description: This has been one bad magic trick.
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.1.label: Rabbit ears
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.1.description: They're so cute, it's like I belong in a Playboy!
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.2.label: Rabbit ears
LanguageData.EtherHareEar.stages.2.description: These ears keep getting in the way!
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.0.label: Cotton tail
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.1.label: Cotton tail
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.2.label: Cotton tail
LanguageData.EtherHareTail.stages.2.description: No, stop asking if I stole the carrots!
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: I feel like galloping across a steppe.
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: Gaze in awe upon me and my glorious mane!
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: My throat feels so hoarse right now. Wait...
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.HorseTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: This is awesome, but I wonder what it would feel like to gallop on all fours.
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Finally, maybe all those flies will finally leave me alone.
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: No! My glorious mane! It's gone!
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Phew, I was sure I was bound for the glue factory soon.
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.HorseRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Aw, I can't even gallop now.
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: Honestly, this is not that bad.
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.1.descr: I'm so full of energy, I could run for days!
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: I know I'm supposed to hate this but... I feel too excited to care.
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.HuskyTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: What's not to like? I guess it'd be fun to try the sled-pulling experience.
LanguageData.HuskyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.HuskyRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Phew... I was having a bit too much fun.
LanguageData.HuskyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.HuskyRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: I'm not as peppy as I used to be.
LanguageData.HuskyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.HuskyRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: I'm not a stinky dog anymore!
LanguageData.HuskyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: No no no... my skin's gotta be here somewhere!
LanguageData.IguanaTransformationMemory.stages.3.desc: I just want to lay under the sun and relax.
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.IguanaRevertedMemory.stages.3.descriptio: Now the sun just burns... this isn't what I wanted.
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: I'm not just a regular cat, I'm a cool-looking lynx!
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.LynxTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I think I want to go out and hunt mice.
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: That fur was getting stuffy... and I shed too much.
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.LynxRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.MegaslothTransformationMemory.stages.0.d: I feel so... slow... and... tired.
LanguageData.MegaslothTransformationMemory.stages.1.d: Ahh... time to just stretch out and relax, I think... zzz...
LanguageData.MegaslothTransformationMemory.stages.3.d: This is nice, but imagine the full-sized body... much better...
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.0.descrip: I think I've had all the sleep I need for five years.
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.2.descrip: I actually have energy to do things now!
LanguageData.MegaslothRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.MonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.1.desc: Oooh oooh ah ah! I feel closer to my roots.
LanguageData.MonkeyTransformationMemory.stages.2.desc: It feels like I've gone back three steps in the evolutionary tree!
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.0.descriptio: I need to shave, I think I'm still hairier than before.
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.1.descriptio: I suppose all things must come to an end...
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.MonkeyRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I have this uncontrollable urge to pounce and hunt things.
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I'm so sleek and svelte, this is fantastic!
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I don't want to be a stupid big cat! I hate cats!
LanguageData.PantherTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: Meow! Now, to go the rest of the way?
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Those claws were really getting in the way.
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: Not fair, I enjoyed feeling so sleek.
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.PantherRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: This is the opposite of what I wanted.
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I don't want to be a damn pig!
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.1.descrip: Wow, rolling in mud is so much nicer than I thought.
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: I don't want to be a filthy hog!
LanguageData.PigTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Yeah, I think I'll try a diet now.
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw man, it was good to be the big pig.
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.PigRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: I feel like digging in the trash, but... eugh.
LanguageData.RaccoonTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: I don't want to be a smelly raccoon!
LanguageData.RaccoonTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: Wow, look at these dainty claws!
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more garbage, please.
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: Aw man, but I looked so sneaky and cool.
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: I don't think I can stand the smell of rubbish now.
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.RaccoonRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: Became ratmorph
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.0.descrip: I feel like a lab rat... literally!
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: Became ratmorph
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: Became ratmorph
LanguageData.RatTransformationMemory.stages.2.descrip: Am I gonna build a nest in my sleep or something?
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Back to normal! Those teeth were annoying.
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: Aw, but I kind of liked being a rat.
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: I'm never going to eat cheese again!
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.RatRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: But I wanted to be a cute rat!
I feel so heavy, and this horn is really something else.
I'm a huge war machine, this is incredible!
I'm going to run you over if you don't turn me back right now!
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.0.descri: I'm normal again, and there's no heavy horn on my face!
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.1.descri: I feel so much weaker. I'm not as special as before.
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.2.descri: I feel human again, and those bestial features are gone!
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.RhinocerosRevertedMemory.stages.3.descri: I feel so weak now. I wanted more, not less!
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.0.descr: Ugh, that's a lot of hair. Where's the shears — er, I mean, razor?
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.2.descr: I'm shedding everywhere, this is disgusting.
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.SheepTransformationMemory.stages.3.descr: Hmmm... I wonder how much more sheeplike I could baaaah?
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: Ha, no more shearings for me!
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Thank Randy, I no longer smell like wet hair all the time.
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.SheepRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: Aw, I wanted to be more sheepish, not less.
LanguageData.SquirrelTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: Climbing trees, burying nuts... this is the life!
LanguageData.SquirrelTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: These giant teeth, this massive, bushy tail... turn me back, please!
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.0.descript: Back to normal! Those teeth were annoying.
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.1.descript: Aw, but I kind of liked being a squirrel.
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.2.descript: I'm never going to eat nuts again!
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.SquirrelRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: But I wanted to be a cute squirrel!
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.0.des: This strength isn't bad, but I feel like I'm constantly hungry.
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.1.des: I feel so strong and graceful!
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.2.des: Ugh! Get this horn off of me!
LanguageData.ThrumboTransformationMemory.stages.3.des: I love this strength and this beautiful horn... I bet it would feel better to fully become the wisest animal on the Rim!
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.0.descripti: Feels good to rid of that heavy fur.
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.1.descripti: I miss all that strength, and that graceful horn.
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.2.descripti: I don't think I could have handled being like that for much longer.
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.ThrumboRevertedMemory.stages.3.descripti: I wanted to go further, not go back!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.1.la: !!!TortoiseTransformationMemory's mutation affinity stage needs a label!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.1.de: !!!TortoiseTransformationMemory's mutation affinity stage needs a description!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.2.la: !!!TortoiseTransformationMemory's body purist stage needs a label!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.2.de: !!!TortoiseTransformationMemory's body purist stage needs a description!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.3.la: !!!TortoiseTransformationMemory's primal wish stage needs a label!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseTransformationMemory.stages.3.de: !!!TortoiseTransformationMemory's primal wish stage needs a description!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: !!!TortoiseRevertedMemory's default stage needs a label!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: !!!TortoiseRevertedMemory's mutation affinity stage needs a label!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.1.descript: !!!TortoiseRevertedMemory's mutation affinity stage needs a description!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: !!!TortoiseRevertedMemory's body purist stage needs a label!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.2.descript: !!!TortoiseRevertedMemory's body purist stage needs a description!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: !!!TortoiseRevertedMemory's primal wish stage needs a label!!!
LanguageData.TortoiseRevertedMemory.stages.3.descript: !!!TortoiseRevertedMemory's primal wish stage needs a description!!!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: I feel so brutish and bestial.
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.1.descri: These muscles make me feel so powerful, like I could run forever!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: I look so ugly and animalistic. I don't want this at all!
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.WargTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I feel so bestial and strong. I bet it would be even better as a full warg!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.0.description: I'm normal again, and veggies don't taste disgusting anymore!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.1.description: I feel so much weaker, and meat tastes so bland now.
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Those bestial features and urges are gone, phew!
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.WargRevertedMemory.stages.3.description: I feel so weak now. I wanted more, not less!
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.0.descri: This fur is making me so hot. I think I need to start panting.
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.2.descri: This fur is horrible, and all these smells are overwhelming.
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.3.label: changed
LanguageData.WolfTransformationMemory.stages.3.descri: I love this fur and all these smells, I want to go even further!
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.0.label: reverted
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.1.label: reverted
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.2.label: reverted
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.2.description: Everything smells normal again, and the urge to howl is gone!
LanguageData.WolfRevertedMemory.stages.3.label: reverted
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.stages.0.label: Wolf ears
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.stages.0.description: They're a bit too sensitive, everything's too loud for comfort.
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.stages.1.label: Wolf ears
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.stages.1.description: My hearing is so clear now, I bet I could hear a pin drop on the other side of the colony!
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.stages.2.label: Wolf ears
LanguageData.EtherWolfEar.stages.2.description: I swear I can hear them talking about me. Why is this happening to me?
LanguageData.EtherWolfTail.stages.0.label: Wolf tail
LanguageData.EtherWolfTail.stages.0.description: I hope making a tail-hole in my pants won't be too hard.
LanguageData.EtherWolfTail.stages.1.label: Wolf tail
LanguageData.EtherWolfTail.stages.1.description: Whenever I think about it it just starts to wag!
LanguageData.EtherWolfTail.stages.2.label: Wolf tail
LanguageData.EtherWolfTail.stages.2.description: I can't even sit on a chair without this damn thing getting in the way!
LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stages.0.label: Wolf muzzle
LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stages.0.description: I sound ridiculous trying to speak with this thing.
LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stages.1.label: Wolf muzzle
LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stages.1.description: So many scents! This is incredible!
LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stages.2.label: Wolf muzzle
LanguageData.EtherWolfMuzzle.stages.2.description: I'm smelling things I wish I couldn't. I want my old face back.
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.0.label: paw-hands
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to do anything with paws for hands?
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.1.label: paw-hands
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.1.description: Sure they're not as flexible...but they're cute. That's all that matters, right?
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.2.label: paw-hands
LanguageData.CanidPawHandMemory.stages.2.description: Not my hands, not my damned hands!
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.0.label: hoof-hands
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.0.description: I can't do anything with hooves!
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.1.label: hoof-hands
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.1.description: They're kinda cool. Useless, but cool?
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.2.label: hoof-hands
LanguageData.HoofHandMemory.stages.2.description: They're horrific and beastly, I'm useless!
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.0.label: stump-hands
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.1.label: stump-hands
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.1.description: I will smash through every wall there is.
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.2.label: stump-hands
LanguageData.StumpHandMemory.stages.2.description: I can't even pat a dog without hurting it!
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.0.label: wing tip-hands
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.0.description: I don't have any fingers, what am I supposed to do?!
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.1.label: wing tip-hands
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.1.description: Flap flap. Flap flap. They are admittedly difficult to work with.
LanguageData.WingTipMemory.stages.2.label: wing tip-hands
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.0.label: Fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.0.description: People aren't supposed to have fur.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.1.label: Fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.2.label: Fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stages.2.description: I'm too hot like this, and I don't like how animal it makes me look!
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.0.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to use these things?
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.1.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.1.description: Okay sure, they might not be practical for lifting things, or flying, or really anything I guess; but they do allow me to do an even better imitation of a dodo!
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.2.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWingMemory.stages.2.description: How am I supposed to do anything with wings? They don't even let me fly!
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.0.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.0.description: Not hooves, what am I meant to do with these?!
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.1.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.1.description: Hm. Well, I can't say it was unexpected...
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.2.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.3.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherHoofHand.stages.3.description: One step closer to all fours. This is great!
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.0.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.0.description: Are they bent a different way, or is that my heel?
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.1.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.1.description: I can be so much faster like this! Once I get used to it.
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.2.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.2.description: My knee's bending backwards now! What? That's my heel, not my knee? Even worse!
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.3.label: Animal legs
LanguageData.EtherDigitigradeLeg.stages.3.description: Just a bit further, and I won't be able to stand up! How about that?
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.0.label: Paws for feet
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.0.description: Well, at least I won't have a problem walking over gravel.
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.1.label: Paws for feet
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.1.description: Look at my cute little paws!
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.2.label: Paws for feet
LanguageData.PawFootMemory.stages.2.description: Wait, whats happened to my feet? They look like a beasts!
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.0.label: Avian claw-feet
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.0.description: It's a bit wierd walking around on chicken-feet.
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.1.label: Avian claw-feet
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.1.description: I am suprised just how nimble these avian claws are, I haven't missed a step!
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.2.label: Avian claw-feet
LanguageData.AvianFootMemory.stages.2.description: My feet look like a chickens. I wonder if I'm starting to taste like one too?
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.0.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.0.description: Well, at least I don't need shoes anymore.
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.1.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.2.label: Hooves
LanguageData.EtherClovenHoofFoot.stages.2.description: I can't even sneak away from the humiliation anymore... these things cause a racket wherever I go!
LanguageData.EtherWooly.stages.0.label: Wool
LanguageData.EtherWooly.stages.1.label: Wool
LanguageData.EtherWooly.stages.2.label: Wool
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.0.label: Heavy fur
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.1.label: Heavy fur
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.1.description: A thick pelt, for soft hugs.
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.2.label: Heavy fur
LanguageData.EtherThickFurLimb.stages.2.description: It's unbearably hot under this hideous pelt!
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.0.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.1.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.2.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.3.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.FurryAppreciation.stages.4.label: mutation affinity appreciation
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.0.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.1.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.2.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.3.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.BodyPuristDisgustMutation.stages.4.label: body purist disgust
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.0.d: I'm not sure whether this is better or worse for them, but at least they're better equipped to survive.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.1.d: A colonist was turned into an animal. That's not right.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.2.d: We turned a captive into an animal. I know they're our prisoner, but it seems wrong.
LanguageData.DefaultTransformationReaction.stages.3.d: Someone came to our colony, and we betrayed that trust.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.0.label: wild pawn merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.0.descriptio: I really don't think they appreciated that at all.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.1.label: colonist merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.1.descriptio: We did mad science on one of our own, and now they're...horrifying.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.2.label: prisoner merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.2.descriptio: We did mad science on a captive. It's wrong to make them into a monster.
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.3.label: guest merged
LanguageData.DefaultMergedThought.stages.3.descriptio: Someone came to our colony for hospitality, and now they're an abomination.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.0.des: A wild person is human again. We did a good deed.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.1.des: A colonist is human again. We did a good deed.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.2.des: At least it can be undone.
LanguageData.DefaultRevertedPawnReaction.stages.3.des: A guest is human again. Hopefully they'll trust us again, eventually.
LanguageData.DefaultPermanentlyFeralReaction.stages.1: We knew it was coming...but now they can never be human again.
LanguageData.DefaultPermanentlyFeralReaction.stages.2: Did we really expect to turn them back?
LanguageData.FriendMergedThought.stages.0.label: friend merged
LanguageData.FriendMergedThought.stages.0.description: The colony did mad science on my friend and now they're a monster!
LanguageData.RivalMergedThought.stages.0.label: rival merged
LanguageData.RivalMergedThought.stages.0.description: We did mad science on my rival. Serves them right.
LanguageData.FriendPermFeralThought.stages.0.label: friend permanently feral
LanguageData.FriendPermFeralThought.stages.0.descript: My friend is stuck in the body of an animal...forever!
LanguageData.RivalPermFeralThought.stages.0.label: rival permanently feral
LanguageData.RivalPermFeralThought.stages.0.descripti: My rival can never come back from that beastly form now. It suits them.
LanguageData.FriendRevertedThought.stages.0.label: friend reverted
LanguageData.FriendRevertedThought.stages.0.descripti: My friend is human again! Praise Randy!
LanguageData.RivalRevertedThought.stages.0.label: rival reverted
LanguageData.RivalRevertedThought.stages.0.descriptio: Agh, it was somewhat fun seeing them on all-fours though!
LanguageData.RivalTransformedThought.stages.0.label: transformed rival
LanguageData.RivalTransformedThought.stages.0.descrip: My rival is on all fours. Serves them right! I think I like them better like this.
LanguageData.FriendTransformedThought.stages.0.label: transformed friend
LanguageData.FriendTransformedThought.stages.0.descri: My friend turned into a dumb animal!
LanguageData.FatherTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed father
LanguageData.FatherTransformed.stages.0.description: My dad is an animal...I don't know how to feel about this.
LanguageData.MotherTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed mother
LanguageData.MotherTransformed.stages.0.description: My poor mother is nothing but an animal now...
LanguageData.HusbandTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed husband
LanguageData.HusbandTransformed.stages.0.description: My husband was turned into an animal! He's not sleeping in my bed like that.
LanguageData.WifeTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed wife
LanguageData.WifeTransformed.stages.0.description: My wife was turned into an animal! Guess I'll have to find somewhere else to sleep.
LanguageData.BrotherTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed brother
LanguageData.BrotherTransformed.stages.0.description: My brother was transformed into an animal! This is like that weird movie...
LanguageData.SisterTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed sister
LanguageData.SisterTransformed.stages.0.description: My sister was turned into an animal! It should have been me instead...
LanguageData.SonTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed son
LanguageData.SonTransformed.stages.0.description: My son was turned into an animal! My poor boy...
LanguageData.DaughterTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed daughter
LanguageData.DaughterTransformed.stages.0.description: My daughter was turned into an animal! My darling girl...
LanguageData.FriendTransformed.stages.0.label: transformed friend
LanguageData.FriendTransformed.stages.0.description: My friend turned into a dumb animal!
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.0.label: body purist squeamish
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.1.label: body purist disgusted
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.2.label: body purist violated
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.2.descripti: I feel grossed out looking at the changes! No more, please!
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.3.label: body purist horrified
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.3.descripti: I feel sick in my own skin. I want to be human again.
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.4.label: body purist nightmare
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.4.descripti: I look hardly anything like my old self, I'm terrfied!
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.5.label: mutated abomination
LanguageData.BodyPuristMutationSad.stages.5.descripti: There is nothing human left of me. I am an abomination.
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.0.label: changed (none)
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.0.descr: I have am neither bonded or broken
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.1.label: changed (broken)
LanguageData.EtherThoughtMemoryExample.stages.2.label: changed (bonded)
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.0.label: permanently feral
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.0.description: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH I'M A DOG FOREVER (also you should never see this thought)
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.1.label: was a wild animal
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.1.description: I was trapped as a beast, mindless and feral! I'm human again, but I don't think I'll get over this for a long time.
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.2.label: was a sapient animal
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.2.description: I'm glad to be human again. I didn't know what to do as a beast...and I can still feel the instincts tugging at my mind.
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.3.label: was a mad animal
LanguageData.WasAnimal.stages.3.description: I'm sorry...I couldn't control myself from the blind rage! You'd feel it too if you went through what I did.
LanguageData.WasAnimalPrimalWish.stages.0.label: no longer an animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalPrimalWish.stages.0.description: I'm human again? But c'mon, that wa awesome! Put me back in, coach!
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.0.label: permanently feral
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.0.description: I shouldn't have this thought, but it was exhilarating to know I'd never turn back.
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.1.label: was a wild animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.1.description: I was trapped as a beast, mindless and feral! I'm human again, but the experience was...not as bad as I thought?
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.2.label: was a sapient animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.2.description: I'm glad to be human again. I didn't know what to do as a beast, but it did give me some valuable perspective.
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.3.label: was a mad animal
LanguageData.WasAnimalRelieved.stages.3.description: Wow, it felt great to let out all my anger like that!
LanguageData.MyMergeMateDied.stages.0.label: my meldmate {0} died
LanguageData.MyMergeMateDied.stages.0.description: My meldmate died. It feels a bit like dying myself.
LanguageData.KilledMyMergeMate.stages.0.label: killed my meldmate
LanguageData.SoldMyMergeMate.stages.0.label: meldmate sold
LanguageData.SoldMyMergeMate.stages.0.description: My other half was sold to a trader! It was like I was sold too!
LanguageData.MyExMergeDied.stages.0.label: ex-meld {0} died
LanguageData.MyExMergeDied.stages.0.description: The person I was melded to died. It feels sort of good that my darkest secrets are now only mine.
LanguageData.KilledMyExMerge.stages.0.label: killed my ex-meld
LanguageData.SoldMyExMerge.stages.0.label: ex-meld sold
LanguageData.SoldMyExMerge.stages.0.description: We're better off apart, with all that we know about each other.
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.0.label: was melded and permanently feral
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.0.description: This thought should like, never happen.
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.1.label: was melded and feral
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.1.description: It was surreal...I was merged with another person and left with the combined minds of two animals. I feel like we know each other better.
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.2.label: was melded and sapient
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.2.description: I'm glad to be human again, yet I have to say the experience was enlightening. I feel closer to my meldmate than ever!
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.3.label: was melded and mad
LanguageData.WasMerged.stages.3.description: It felt great to let out all that anger with another person!
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.0.label: was melded and permanently feral
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.0.description: This thought should like, never happen.
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.1.label: was melded and feral
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.1.description: I was trapped as a beast in the same body as another! It was horribly uncomfortable to forget my humanity and I can't look them in the eyes for the things they made us do!
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.2.label: was a sapient animal
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.2.description: I was trapped in the body of a beast with another person right next to me! I knew what they were thinking and they knew everything about me. I'm almost traumatised!
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.3.label: was a mad animal
LanguageData.WasMergedRelieved.stages.3.description: I'm sorry! It was the other guy, I swear!
LanguageData.ExoticProduced.stages.0.label: produced
LanguageData.ExoticProducedBond.stages.0.label: produced
LanguageData.ExoticProducedBroken.stages.0.label: produced
LanguageData.MorphAteAnimalMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate kin-animal
LanguageData.MorphAteAnimalMeatDirect.stages.0.descri: I ate the raw flesh of an animal that I look a lot like I do now...
I ate meat from an animal that looked a lot like I do now...
LanguageData.WargMorphAteCorpse.stages.0.label: ate corpse
LanguageData.WargMorphAteCorpse.stages.0.description: I gave in to my beastly thoughts and ate the raw corpse of a fresh kill. Eugh.
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate chaomeat
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatDirect.stages.0.description: It's slimy, raw meat...and didn't these things used to be human?!
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.label: ate chaomeat
LanguageData.AteChaoMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.descrip: It tastes alright, but didn't these things used to be human?!
LanguageData.FurryNoMutations.stages.0.label: morph frustrated
LanguageData.FurryNoMutations.stages.0.description: The human genome is so simple, and I could be so much more.
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.1.desc: I'm already looking great, can't wait for more!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.2.desc: This is so cool. My dream is coming true!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.3.desc: From my head to my toes, I can feel the changes all over. This is incredible!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.4.desc: I'm a beastly freak... and I love it!
LanguageData.FurryMutationThoughtsHappy.stages.5.desc: I knew life was better on the wild side. This is the best thing ever!
LanguageData.ProductiveBliss.stages.0.label: productive bliss
LanguageData.LaidEgg.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.LaidEgg.stages.0.description: This is humiliating...and it doesn't feel like it'll be the last.
LanguageData.LaidEggMale.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.LaidEggMale.stages.0.description: This is humiliating...how does this even work?
LanguageData.LaidEggBond.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.LaidEggBroken.stages.0.label: laid an egg
LanguageData.MilkedMyself.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.MilkedMyselfMale.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.MilkedMyselfBond.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.MilkedMyselfBroken.stages.0.label: milked myself
LanguageData.ChemMilkedMyself.stages.0.label: drained my chemcyst
LanguageData.ChemMilkedMyselfBond.stages.0.label: drained my chemcyst
LanguageData.ChemMilkedMyselfBroken.stages.0.label: drained my chemcyst
LanguageData.ShavedMyself.stages.0.label: shaved myself
LanguageData.ShavedMyself.stages.0.description: That was a lot of hair. I hope this ends soon.
LanguageData.ShavedMyselfBond.stages.0.label: clean shaven
LanguageData.ShavedMyselfBond.stages.0.description: It's weird, but it feels kinda good to shave all that wool off.
LanguageData.ShavedMyselfBroken.stages.0.label: shaved myself... again
LanguageData.FoundTruffles.stages.0.label: found truffles
LanguageData.FoundTruffles.stages.0.description: I managed to find some food while sniffing around in the dirt. Kinda dirty, but tasty.
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.0.label: Giant paws
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to do anything when I can't grab stuff?
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.1.label: Giant paws
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.1.description: Nice, I can claw people's eyes out!
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.2.label: Giant paws
LanguageData.EtherBearPawHand.stages.2.description: These things are only good for hitting whoever did this to me.
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.0.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.0.description: It's not too different, I suppose I can get used to standing on it.
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.1.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.1.description: They're so soft, and I can run barefoot on gravel!
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.2.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.2.description: No no no, I want my regular, non-animal feet back!
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.3.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherPawFoot.stages.3.description: They look just like an animal's feet, this is exactly what I want!
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.0.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.1.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.1.descriptio: Nobody will mess with me now!
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.2.label: Bear face
LanguageData.EtherPolarBearMuzzle.stages.2.descriptio: I have the most horrible images of wanting to attack everything...
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.0.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.1.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.1.description: Okay, this is a bit too weird, even for me.
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.2.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.2.description: This is...oh no, this is chemfuel...oh no no no...this can't be happening!
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.3.label: Chemfuel sac
LanguageData.EtherChemfuelUdder.stages.3.description: I don't see the problem with this, especially if I'm going to be the full thing.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.0.label: Reindeer face
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.0.description: Oh deer, this is going to be tough to get used to.
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.1.label: Reindeer face
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.2.label: Reindeer face
LanguageData.EtherCaribouJaw.stages.2.description: STOP SINGING JINGLE BELLS TO ME!
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryJaw.stages.0.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryJaw.stages.0.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryJaw.stages.1.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryJaw.stages.1.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryJaw.stages.2.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryEar.stages.0.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryEar.stages.0.description: What the, where are my ears?
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryEar.stages.1.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryEar.stages.1.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryEar.stages.2.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryEar.stages.2.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryTail.stages.0.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryTail.stages.0.description: ...does this make my butt look big?
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryTail.stages.1.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryTail.stages.1.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryTail.stages.2.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherCassowaryTail.stages.2.description: I look like a damn bird, whyyyy?!
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.0.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.1.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.2.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherCatMuzzle.stages.2.description: Great, a face not even a mother could love.
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.stages.0.label: Cat ears
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.stages.0.description: These new ears look strange, but at least I can hear well enough.
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.stages.1.label: Cat ears
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.stages.1.description: I can hear everything, even the tiniest rodents!
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.stages.2.label: Cat ears
LanguageData.EtherCatEar.stages.2.description: I hear too much! Make the noise stop!
LanguageData.EtherCatTail.stages.0.label: Cat tail
LanguageData.EtherCatTail.stages.0.description: This tail keeps getting in the way, but it's good for balance.
LanguageData.EtherCatTail.stages.1.label: Cat tail
LanguageData.EtherCatTail.stages.2.label: Cat tail
LanguageData.EtherCatTail.stages.2.description: I keep tripping over this stupid tail!
LanguageData.EtherCatClaws.stages.0.label: Claws
LanguageData.EtherCatClaws.stages.1.label: Claws
LanguageData.EtherCatClaws.stages.1.description: Claws are so useful, I'll never need a knife again!
LanguageData.EtherCatClaws.stages.2.label: Claws
LanguageData.EtherCatClaws.stages.2.description: I keep poking holes in my clothes with these unruly claws!
LanguageData.EtherCatEye.stages.0.label: Cat eyes
LanguageData.EtherCatEye.stages.0.description: My eyes feel strange, but I can see better than I ever could before.
LanguageData.EtherCatEye.stages.1.label: Cat eyes
LanguageData.EtherCatEye.stages.1.description: I can see in the dark better than ever, and my eyes look so mysterious!
LanguageData.EtherCatEye.stages.2.label: Cat eyes
LanguageData.EtherCatEye.stages.2.description: These slit pupils make me look unnatural.
LanguageData.EtherBeak.stages.0.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherBeak.stages.0.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!
LanguageData.EtherBeak.stages.1.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherBeak.stages.1.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.
LanguageData.EtherBeak.stages.2.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherTailfeathers.stages.0.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherTailfeathers.stages.0.description: ...does this make my butt look big?
LanguageData.EtherTailfeathers.stages.1.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherTailfeathers.stages.1.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.
LanguageData.EtherTailfeathers.stages.2.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherTailfeathers.stages.2.description: I look like a damn chicken, whyyyy?!
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.0.label: Feathers
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.0.description: They're itchy as hell and get in the way of clothes...
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.1.label: Feathers
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.1.description: I could preen them all day.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.2.label: Feathers
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stages.2.description: I keep pulling them out but they keep regrowing! They're so itchy, aaghhh!
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.0.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.0.description: How am I supposed to do anything with wings for arms?!
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.1.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.1.description: Wait, I can't fly with these, AND I lose my hands...? I'm starting to rethink this now...
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.2.label: Wings
LanguageData.EtherWing.stages.2.description: Why, Randy, why?! I'm completely useless without my arms!
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.0.label: Talons
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.0.description: They're so...animal, and I leave scratches on wooden floors.
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.1.label: Talons
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.1.description: I can be really quick on these, and maybe do some damage!
LanguageData.EtherAvianFoot.stages.2.label: Talons
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.0.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.0.description: How is this even possible? It feels so weird...
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.1.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.1.description: This is taking it too far. People weren't meant to lay eggs!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.2.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.2.description: How!? Why!? What has become of me!?
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.3.label: ...eggs?!
LanguageData.EtherEggLayer.stages.3.description: I know I wanted this, but I'm not entirely sure now.
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.0.label: Tiny rodent face
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to eat when my mouth is so small!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.1.label: Tiny rodent face
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.1.description: My face is so tiny and cute!
LanguageData.EtherChinchillaJaw.stages.2.label: Tiny rodent face
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.0.label: Snake face
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.0.description: Thissss long tounge makesss it hard not to ssssssslur my Sssssss ssssounds...
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.1.label: Snake face
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.1.description: Sssssharp fangs to match a sssharp tounge.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.2.label: Snake face
LanguageData.EtherSnakeJaw.stages.2.description: Sssssstupid tounge tassssting the sssstupid air... Now I have to tassste every rotten sssssmell too.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.0.label: Snake hood
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.0.description: It'sss hard to fit a T-shirt over thissss hood now.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.1.label: Snake hood
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.1.description: How exotic! I could ssscare away any jerks I don't like with thisss.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHood.stages.2.label: Snake hood
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.0.label: Snake tail
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.0.description: Thissss will take ssssome getting ussssed to.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.1.label: Snake tail
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.1.description: Sssslithering here, sssslithering there, sssslithering everywhere!
LanguageData.EtherSnakeTail.stages.2.label: Snake tail
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.0.label: Scales
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.0.description: I wish I didn't ssssshed sssso much...
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.1.label: Scales
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.2.label: Scales
LanguageData.EtherScaledLimb.stages.2.description: They're coarse and rough and irritating and they're EVERYWHERE!!!
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHand.stages.0.label: Snake...hands?
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHand.stages.0.description: I ssssuppossse at leassssst I keep my handssss...
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHand.stages.1.label: Snake...hands?
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHand.stages.1.description: Armored handssss, no more paper cutsssss...
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHand.stages.2.label: Snake...hands?
LanguageData.EtherSnakeHand.stages.2.description: Thank whatever god there isss. I sssstill have handssss.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeEye.stages.0.label: Snake eyes
LanguageData.EtherSnakeEye.stages.0.description: At least I can sssstill ssssee properly.
LanguageData.EtherSnakeEye.stages.1.label: Snake eyes
LanguageData.EtherSnakeEye.stages.1.description: The eyesssss of a cunning tricksssssster...
LanguageData.EtherSnakeEye.stages.2.label: Snake eyes
LanguageData.EtherSnakeEye.stages.2.description: These eyesss look cold and unnatural...
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.0.label: Cold blooded
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.0.description: I just can't ever get myself warm enough.
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.1.label: Cold blooded
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.1.description: Nothing feels quite like sunning myself on a warm rock.
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.2.label: Cold blooded
LanguageData.EtherColdBlooded.stages.2.description: I'm freaking c-c-c-cold all the time now!
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stages.0.label: Cougar face
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stages.1.label: Cougar face
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stages.2.label: Cougar face
LanguageData.EtherCougarJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherCougarEar.stages.0.label: Cougar ear
LanguageData.EtherCougarEar.stages.0.description: Ouch, these things can hear everything.
LanguageData.EtherCougarEar.stages.1.label: Cougar ear
LanguageData.EtherCougarEar.stages.2.label: Cougar ear
LanguageData.EtherCougarEar.stages.2.description: I feel like an anime character...
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.stages.0.label: Cougar tail
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.stages.0.description: This thing is getting in the way a bit.
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.stages.1.label: Cougar tail
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.stages.1.description: Wow, I have a tail! Awesome!
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.stages.2.label: Cougar tail
LanguageData.EtherCougarTail.stages.2.description: This thing keeps getting in my way! Get it off me!
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.0.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk right with this giant muzzle in the way.
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.1.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.2.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.2.description: I look and sound like a dumb animal!
LanguageData.EtherCowSnout.stages.3.label: Cow face
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.stages.0.label: Cow ears
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.stages.0.description: They're soft, but they are rather large...
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.stages.1.label: Cow ears
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.stages.1.description: These are a great looooook on me!
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.stages.2.label: Cow ears
LanguageData.EtherCowEar.stages.2.description: Not my ears! I dooooon't want to be a coooow!
LanguageData.EtherCowTail.stages.0.label: Cow tail
LanguageData.EtherCowTail.stages.1.label: Cow tail
LanguageData.EtherCowTail.stages.1.description: The hole in the pants is worth it for this.
LanguageData.EtherCowTail.stages.2.label: Cow tail
LanguageData.EtherCowTail.stages.2.description: It's terribly uncomfortable, and I can't sit in a chair!
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.0.label: Horns
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.0.description: Well, I guess I'm done wearing hats...
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.1.label: Horns
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.1.description: You mess with the bull, you get the horns!
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.2.label: Horns
LanguageData.EtherHorns.stages.2.description: Maybe I can file them down...would they grow back?
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.0.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.0.description: I regret everything, I don't like this at all.
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.1.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.1.description: Oh, uhm. This is a strange turn of events, I have to think about this for a bit...
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.2.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.3.label: ...udder?!
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.3.description: I mean, it's kind of cool. I feel like a real cow now!
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.0.label: Deer face
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.0.description: Look at my nose, it's just so...animal.
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.1.label: Deer face
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.2.label: Deer face
LanguageData.EtherDeerSnout.stages.2.description: I could really use some buckshot right now.
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.0.label: Deer ears
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.0.description: Any noise causes them to flick up...
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.1.label: Deer ears
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.1.description: I can hear predators so easily now...uh, I mean, raiders!
LanguageData.EtherDeerEar.stages.2.label: Deer ears
LanguageData.EtherShortTail.stages.0.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherShortTail.stages.0.description: It'd be nice if it didn't flick up whenever people scare me...
LanguageData.EtherShortTail.stages.1.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherShortTail.stages.2.label: Short tail
LanguageData.EtherShortTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it.
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.0.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.0.description: They would be fine if they weren't constantly getting stuck in door frames.
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.1.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.1.description: This is awesome! I feel like I could just ram into things and destroy them!
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.2.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.2.description: This is ridiculous! How am I supposed to even get on shirts now?
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.3.label: Antlers
LanguageData.EtherAntlers.stages.3.description: Closer to the forest, and closer to my dream.
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryJaw.stages.0.label: Camel face
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryJaw.stages.0.description: This thing is only good for chewing grass.
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryJaw.stages.1.label: Camel face
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryJaw.stages.2.label: Camel face
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryJaw.stages.2.description: I want to eat a bush right now...this is horrible!
LanguageData.EtherTrunk.stages.0.label: Trunk
LanguageData.EtherTrunk.stages.1.label: Trunk
LanguageData.EtherTrunk.stages.1.description: I gotta give this a toot.
LanguageData.EtherTrunk.stages.2.label: Trunk
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.0.label: Huge ears
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.0.description: These things are always flopping around and getting in the way...
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.1.label: Huge ears
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.1.description: I can hear everything for miles!
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.2.label: Huge ears
LanguageData.EtherElephantEar.stages.2.description: Could it get any more obvious that I'm a mutated freak?
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.0.label: Elephant tail
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.1.label: Elephant tail
LanguageData.EtherElephantTail.stages.2.label: Elephant tail
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.0.label: Thick hide
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.0.description: My skin feels like hard leather, it's a little uncomfortable.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.1.label: Thick hide
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.1.description: Nobody will be able to hurt me like this! Except emotionally...
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.2.label: Thick hide
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stages.2.description: Eww, it's so dense and wrinkled, like a giant callous...
LanguageData.EtherElephantLeg.stages.0.label: Huge legs
LanguageData.EtherElephantLeg.stages.0.description: I feel like I have trees for legs.
LanguageData.EtherElephantLeg.stages.1.label: Huge legs
LanguageData.EtherElephantLeg.stages.1.description: Try to push me over now!
LanguageData.EtherElephantLeg.stages.2.label: Huge legs
LanguageData.EtherElephantLeg.stages.2.description: Now I have to wear XXL pants!
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.0.label: Huge feet
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.0.description: These things are the size of a dinner plate.
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.1.label: Huge feet
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.1.description: Stomp, stomp, stomp! This is fun!
LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.2.label: Huge feet
