LanguageData.EtherElephantFoot.stages.2.description: What am I gonna do with my shoes?
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.0.label: Elk ears
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.0.description: At least they keep the flies off themselves.
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.1.label: Elk ears
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.1.description: I can hear so well now!
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.2.label: Elk ears
LanguageData.EtherElkEar.stages.2.description: These things are so twitchy, get them off me!
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.0.label: Elk tail
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.0.description: Is this stubby little thing...a tail?
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.1.label: Elk tail
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.2.label: Elk tail
LanguageData.EtherElkTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it.
LanguageData.EtherEmuJaw.stages.0.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherEmuJaw.stages.0.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!
LanguageData.EtherEmuJaw.stages.1.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherEmuJaw.stages.1.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.
LanguageData.EtherEmuJaw.stages.2.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherEmuEar.stages.0.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherEmuEar.stages.0.description: What the, where are my ears?
LanguageData.EtherEmuEar.stages.1.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherEmuEar.stages.1.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?
LanguageData.EtherEmuEar.stages.2.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherEmuEar.stages.2.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!
LanguageData.EtherEmuTail.stages.0.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherEmuTail.stages.0.description: ...does this make my butt look big?
LanguageData.EtherEmuTail.stages.1.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherEmuTail.stages.1.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.
LanguageData.EtherEmuTail.stages.2.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherEmuTail.stages.2.description: I look like a damn bird, why?!
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.0.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.0.description: Okay, I'll admit it, these are pretty cool.
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.1.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.1.description: Pointy and fluffy ears, these are great — and I can hear everything!
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.2.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFoxEar.stages.2.description: ...if there's one awful mutation I'm OK with...
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.0.label: Fox eyes
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.0.description: I look reasonably exotic with these...
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.1.label: Fox eyes
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.1.description: I can see in the dark, and they look so cool!
LanguageData.EtherFoxEye.stages.2.label: Fox eyes
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.0.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.1.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.1.description: Oh, so that's how foxes make all those cool noises! Yip!
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.2.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherFoxMuzzle.stages.2.description: My face is ruined, and I can't even talk right!
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.0.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.0.description: It gets in the way, but it's really fluffy...I could almost use it as a pillow.
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.1.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.1.description: It's so fluffy I think I'm gonna die!
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.2.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFluffyTail.stages.2.description: Sure it's cute...but it's attached to me!
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stages.0.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stages.1.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stages.1.descriptio: Oh, so that's how foxes make all those cool noises! Yip!
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stages.2.label: Fox face
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxMuzzle.stages.2.descriptio: My face is ruined, and I can't even talk right!
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxEar.stages.0.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxEar.stages.0.description: Okay, I'll admit it, these are pretty cool.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxEar.stages.1.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxEar.stages.1.description: Pointy and fluffy ears, these are great — and I can hear everything!
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxEar.stages.2.label: Fox ears
LanguageData.EtherArcticFoxEar.stages.2.description: ...if there's one awful mutation I'm OK with...
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.0.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.0.descripti: It gets in the way, but it's really fluffy...I could almost use it as a pillow.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.1.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.1.descripti: It's so fluffy I think I'm gonna die!
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.2.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherArcticFluffyTail.stages.2.descripti: Sure it's cute...but it's attached to me!
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stages.0.label: Tiny fox face
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stages.0.descriptio: I have a sudden compulsion to begin screaming for no reason.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stages.1.label: Tiny fox face
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxMuzzle.stages.2.label: Tiny fox face
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxEar.stages.0.label: Huge fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxEar.stages.0.description: Okay, I'll admit it, these are pretty cool.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxEar.stages.1.label: Huge fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxEar.stages.1.description: Pointy and fluffy ears, these are great — and I can hear everything!
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxEar.stages.2.label: Huge fox ears
LanguageData.EtherFennecFoxEar.stages.2.description: These ears are too damn big!
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.0.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.0.descripti: It gets in the way, but it's really fluffy...I could almost use it as a pillow.
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.1.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.1.descripti: It's so fluffy I think I'm gonna die!
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.2.label: Fluffy tail
LanguageData.EtherFennecFluffyTail.stages.2.descripti: Sure it's cute...but it's attached to me!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.0.label: Gazelle face
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.0.description: It's long, but it's got an interesting marking at least...
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.1.label: Gazelle face
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.1.description: So cool! Give me that grass!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleJaw.stages.2.label: Gazelle face
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.0.label: Gazelle ears
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.0.description: Why do they have to have interesting markings? I'm so going to get shot by a raider.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.1.label: Gazelle ears
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.1.description: Cooler! I can hear everything! Even the grass growing!
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.2.label: Gazelle ears
LanguageData.EtherGazelleEar.stages.2.description: I'm going to get skinned for these...
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.0.label: Little tail
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.0.description: It's fine, I guess, and easy enough to hide.
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.1.label: Little tail
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.2.label: Little tail
LanguageData.EtherGazelleTail.stages.2.description: Why do even need this tail...
LanguageData.EtherHorseFace.stages.0.label: Long face
LanguageData.EtherHorseFace.stages.1.label: Long face
LanguageData.EtherHorseFace.stages.1.description: So a horse walks into a bar...
LanguageData.EtherHorseFace.stages.2.label: Long face
LanguageData.EtherHorseFace.stages.2.description: I feel like the setup of a terrible joke!
LanguageData.EtherHorseEar.stages.0.label: Horse ear
LanguageData.EtherHorseEar.stages.0.description: They keep flicking around when I don't want them to.
LanguageData.EtherHorseEar.stages.1.label: Horse ear
LanguageData.EtherHorseEar.stages.2.label: Horse ear
LanguageData.EtherHorseEar.stages.2.description: But I don't even like horses! I don't want their ears!
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.stages.0.label: Horse tail
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.stages.0.description: It's just a bundle of useless hair...
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.stages.1.label: Horse tail
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.stages.1.description: It's not terribly useful, but boy is it aesthetic!
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.stages.2.label: Horse tail
LanguageData.EtherHorseTail.stages.2.description: Yeah, this is getting a trim.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.0.label: Springy legs
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.0.description: If I hear one more 'spring in my step' joke...
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.label: Springy legs
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.description: I guess these things ARE lucky!
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.label: Springy legs
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.description: This is wrong. My feet are wrong, they're covered in fur...this is WRONG!
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.stages.0.label: Husky face
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.stages.1.label: Husky face
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.stages.2.label: Husky face
LanguageData.EtherHuskyMuzzle.stages.2.description: I shouldn't like it, but the husky is making me.
LanguageData.EtherHuskyEar.stages.0.label: Pointy dog ears
LanguageData.EtherHuskyEar.stages.0.description: They're pretty cute, I gotta say.
LanguageData.EtherHuskyEar.stages.1.label: Pointy dog ears
LanguageData.EtherHuskyEar.stages.1.description: They flick and point to sounds, and they're unreasonably fluffy!
LanguageData.EtherHuskyEar.stages.2.label: Pointy dog ears
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.stages.0.label: Curly fluff tail
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.stages.0.description: I gotta calm down, it keeps wagging...
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.stages.1.label: Curly fluff tail
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.stages.1.description: I'm so excited, it's wagging so fast!
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.stages.2.label: Curly fluff tail
LanguageData.EtherHuskyTail.stages.2.description: I know I don't like it...but it's still wagging and it kind of feels OK.
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.0.label: Goat face
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.0.description: This isn't what I was planning to wake up to this morning...
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.1.label: Goat face
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.1.description: Maaah! I want to ram something!
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.2.label: Goat face
LanguageData.EtherIbexJaw.stages.2.description: My face...what's wrong with my face!?
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.0.label: Goat ears
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.0.description: At least I can hear a bit better...
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.1.label: Goat ears
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.1.description: I can hear echoes so well now!
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.2.label: Goat ears
LanguageData.EtherIbexEar.stages.2.description: If anyone mentions the story about the goats and that bridge, they're a dead man!
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.0.label: Goat tail
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.0.description: What? What tail? I can't see it!
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.1.label: Goat tail
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.2.label: Goat tail
LanguageData.EtherIbexTail.stages.2.description: At least I can hide it...
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stages.0.label: Lizard face
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stages.1.label: Lizard face
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stages.1.description: I look like a raptor! Fear me!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stages.2.label: Lizard face
LanguageData.EtherIguanaSnout.stages.2.description: Ew! I have to eat with this gross, scaly thing!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.0.label: Spikes
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.0.description: These make it kind of tough to put on shirts and hats, but I'll make do.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.1.label: Spikes
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.1.description: I think I can style these and make a new, unique look for myself!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.2.label: Spikes
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHorns.stages.2.description: These damn things get caught in everything, and it hurts!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stages.0.label: Lizard tail
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stages.0.description: This thing gets stuck in doors often, but at least it helps with my balance a bit.
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stages.1.label: Lizard tail
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stages.1.description: I can use this to whip people like a real iguana! Maybe it will help me swim too...
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stages.2.label: Lizard tail
LanguageData.EtherIguanaTail.stages.2.description: Do lizard tails regrow if I were to get this thing removed?
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHand.stages.0.label: Scaly hand
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHand.stages.0.description: I would like them more if the claws wouldn't get stuck on things...
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHand.stages.1.label: Scaly hand
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHand.stages.1.description: These claws feel like they can just tear through everything!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHand.stages.2.label: Scaly hand
LanguageData.EtherIguanaHand.stages.2.description: My fingers look so long and weird! These claws are going to have to be filed down...
LanguageData.EtherIguanaFoot.stages.0.label: Scaly foot
LanguageData.EtherIguanaFoot.stages.1.label: Scaly foot
LanguageData.EtherIguanaFoot.stages.1.description: Just look at these powerful looking feet! Scaly and strong!
LanguageData.EtherIguanaFoot.stages.2.label: Scaly foot
LanguageData.EtherIguanaFoot.stages.2.description: Ew, ew, ew! Nope, these are going to have to come off.
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stages.0.label: Dog face
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stages.0.descr: I just need to pant all the time...
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stages.1.label: Dog face
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stages.2.label: Dog face
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverJaw.stages.2.descr: I can't be sad with this smile...
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.stages.0.label: Dog ears
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.stages.0.descr: They flop around all the time, it's distracting.
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.stages.1.label: Dog ears
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.stages.1.descr: I can hear better, and they're floppy and cute!
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.stages.2.label: Dog ears
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverEar.stages.2.descr: I want my own ears back, give them BARK!
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverTail.stages.0.desc: Now everyone knows what I'm thinking!
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverTail.stages.1.desc: Awwww, it's so cute on me!
LanguageData.EtherLabradorRetrieverTail.stages.2.desc: Why do I have to ruin all my pants for a tail that won't stop wagging?
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stages.0.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stages.1.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stages.2.label: Cat face
LanguageData.EtherLynxJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.stages.0.label: Cat ears
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.stages.0.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad. In fact, they're kinda cool.
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.stages.1.label: Cat ears
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.stages.1.description: I look so cute with these ears!
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.stages.2.label: Cat ears
LanguageData.EtherLynxEar.stages.2.description: What's with the fur on top of these things?
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.stages.0.label: Bobcat tail
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.stages.0.description: There's not much to say. It's a short tail.
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.stages.1.label: Bobcat tail
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.stages.1.description: I wish it was longer...but hey, a tail's a tail!
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.stages.2.label: Bobcat tail
LanguageData.EtherLynxTail.stages.2.description: It's so short and stubby...at least I can kind of hide it.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stages.0.label: Sloth face
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stages.1.label: Sloth face
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothSnout.stages.2.label: Sloth face
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.0.label: Fluff tuft
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.0.description: This tail is too heavy. Or is it just that I'm slower now?
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.1.label: Fluff tuft
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.1.description: I can't complain about a massive, fluffy tail!
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.2.label: Fluff tuft
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothTail.stages.2.description: God, this thing drags dirt everywhere...
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothArm.stages.0.label: Giant hairy arms
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothArm.stages.0.description: My arm is so burly and slow to move...
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothArm.stages.1.label: Giant hairy arms
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothArm.stages.1.description: I'll need a bigger bed, but this heavy feeling is great!
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothArm.stages.2.label: Giant hairy arms
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothArm.stages.2.description: GROSS! I want my normal, non-disgusting arms back!
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.0.label: Giant claws
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.0.description: I don't think I'll get used to these huge claws any time soon.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.1.label: Giant claws
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.1.description: Don't get on my bad side...sometime tomorrow.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.2.label: Giant claws
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothHand.stages.2.description: How am I meant to wipe?!
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothLeg.stages.0.label: Giant hairy legs
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothLeg.stages.0.description: Ugh, I barely want to move these legs...
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothLeg.stages.1.label: Giant hairy legs
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothLeg.stages.1.description: Wow, this is a lot of weight to carry around, but I think it's worth it.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothLeg.stages.2.label: Giant hairy legs
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothLeg.stages.2.description: What has my life come to? I hate this!
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothFoot.stages.0.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothFoot.stages.0.description: These sloth feet don't really want me to move at a quick pace...
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothFoot.stages.1.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothFoot.stages.1.description: Time to kick these babies up and relax all day.
LanguageData.EtherMegaslothFoot.stages.2.label: Giant feet
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.0.label: Thick wool
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.0.description: I feel like I spend every waking minute shaving this stuff off...
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.1.label: Thick wool
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.1.description: It's like a giant, fluffy blanket...and it goes wherever I go!
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.2.label: Thick wool
LanguageData.EtherMegawoolly.stages.2.description: This wool is thick, hot and itchy...I don't like it one bit!
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stages.0.label: Monkey face
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stages.0.description: I feel like I need to shave constantly...
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stages.1.label: Monkey face
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stages.1.description: This isn't really all that different...
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stages.2.label: Monkey face
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyJaw.stages.2.description: I've taken a step *back*! This is terrible!
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyEar.stages.0.label: Monkey ears
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyEar.stages.0.description: My ears...they feel like they're larger.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyEar.stages.1.label: Monkey ears
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyEar.stages.2.label: Monkey ears
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyEar.stages.2.description: Why are my ears bigger, that's almost useless!
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.stages.0.label: Monkey tail
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.stages.0.description: Huh...I can pick things up with this tail. Neat.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.stages.1.label: Monkey tail
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.stages.1.description: It's like another hand. Who needs bionics when you have this?
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.stages.2.label: Monkey tail
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyTail.stages.2.description: I can feel it moving, and I really don't like the sensation of being able to control it!
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.0.label: Hairy hands
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.0.description: These kinda look like my normal hands...just more primitive.
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.1.label: Hairy hands
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.1.description: I might get good wishes out these monkey paws!
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.2.label: Hairy hands
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyHand.stages.2.description: My hands! They look weird and old!
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stages.0.label: Hairy feet
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stages.0.description: Why can I grab things with my feet?
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stages.1.label: Hairy feet
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stages.2.label: Hairy feet
LanguageData.EtherMonkeyFoot.stages.2.description: Why do my shoes feel so big, and my feet so small?
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.0.label: Bovine face
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.0.description: My face is hot and fluffy, not a good mix...
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.1.label: Bovine face
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.1.description: I'm so fluffy, and a nice shade of blue!
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.2.label: Bovine face
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloJaw.stages.2.description: If I hear "Why so blue?" one more time, I'm going to cry.
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloEar.stages.0.label: Bovine ears
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloEar.stages.1.label: Bovine ears
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloEar.stages.2.label: Bovine ears
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloTail.stages.0.label: Bovine tail
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloTail.stages.0.description: Muffalo have tails? I've never seen one.
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloTail.stages.1.label: Bovine tail
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloTail.stages.2.label: Bovine tail
LanguageData.EtherMuffaloTail.stages.2.description: Is someone flicking me? Where is it coming from?
LanguageData.EtherOstrichJaw.stages.0.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherOstrichJaw.stages.0.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!
LanguageData.EtherOstrichJaw.stages.1.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherOstrichJaw.stages.1.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.
LanguageData.EtherOstrichJaw.stages.2.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherOstrichEar.stages.0.label: Earholes
LanguageData.EtherOstrichEar.stages.0.description: What the, where are my ears?
LanguageData.EtherOstrichEar.stages.1.label: Earholes
LanguageData.EtherOstrichEar.stages.1.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?
LanguageData.EtherOstrichEar.stages.2.label: Earholes
LanguageData.EtherOstrichEar.stages.2.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!
LanguageData.EtherOstrichTail.stages.0.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherOstrichTail.stages.0.description: ...does this make my butt look big?
LanguageData.EtherOstrichTail.stages.1.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherOstrichTail.stages.1.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.
LanguageData.EtherOstrichTail.stages.2.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherOstrichTail.stages.2.description: I look like a damn bird, whyyyy?!
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stages.0.label: Panther face
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stages.1.label: Panther face
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stages.2.label: Panther face
LanguageData.EtherPantherJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherPantherEar.stages.0.label: Panther ears
LanguageData.EtherPantherEar.stages.0.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad.
LanguageData.EtherPantherEar.stages.1.label: Panther ears
LanguageData.EtherPantherEar.stages.2.label: Panther ears
LanguageData.EtherPantherEar.stages.2.description: I feel like an anime character...
LanguageData.EtherPantherTail.stages.0.label: Panther tail
LanguageData.EtherPantherTail.stages.0.description: Why does this thing move so much?
LanguageData.EtherPantherTail.stages.1.label: Panther tail
LanguageData.EtherPantherTail.stages.2.label: Panther tail
LanguageData.EtherPantherTail.stages.2.description: How am I supposed to sit down in a chair with this thing?
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.0.label: Raccoon mask
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.0.description: I feel like I should be rooting around in a trash can.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.1.label: Raccoon mask
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.2.label: Raccoon mask
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonJaw.stages.2.description: Why do I want to eat garbage...
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.0.label: Raccoon ears
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.0.description: They're alright, but I'd prefer to have my normal ears.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.1.label: Raccoon ears
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonEar.stages.2.label: Raccoon ears
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.0.label: Ringtail
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.0.description: The pattern on this thing is kinda cool, I guess.
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.1.label: Ringtail
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.1.description: It's like a tube of fluffiness! Tails are great!
LanguageData.EtherRaccoonTail.stages.2.label: Ringtail
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.0.label: Ratty face
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.0.description: It's too sensitive for my liking. I'm almost overwhelmed with strong smells.
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.1.label: Ratty face
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.1.description: A lot of people say rats are gross, but I think this looks good on me!
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.2.label: Ratty face
LanguageData.EtherRatSnout.stages.2.description: I don't want to look like a squeaking PEST!
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.0.label: Rat ears
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.1.label: Rat ears
LanguageData.EtherRatEar.stages.2.label: Rat ears
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.0.label: Rat tail
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.1.label: Rat tail
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.1.description: I wish it was better at something...
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.2.label: Rat tail
LanguageData.EtherRatTail.stages.2.description: I feel dirty and like a thief, like this is a punishment...
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.0.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.0.descriptio: These paws sure are good at picking up little things off the ground.
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.1.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.1.descriptio: They're so dainty and dextrous, these are better than my old hands!
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.2.label: Rodent hands
LanguageData.EtherDextrousPawHand.stages.2.descriptio: Ahhhhh! They're so wrinkly! Get them off me!
LanguageData.EtherRatFoot.stages.0.label: Rat feet
LanguageData.EtherRatFoot.stages.1.label: Rat feet
LanguageData.EtherRatFoot.stages.1.description: Perfect for stealing and getting out fast!
LanguageData.EtherRatFoot.stages.2.label: Rat feet
LanguageData.EtherRatFoot.stages.2.description: I have the feet of a sewer beast!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.0.label: Rhino horn
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.0.description: Let's hope the colony doesn't want to mount my head on a wall...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.1.label: Rhino horn
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.1.description: Look at this majestic horn, I feel powerful!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.2.label: Rhino horn
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosJaw.stages.2.description: I WILL STAB SOMEBODY WITH THIS THING.
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.0.label: Rhino ears
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.0.description: Did someone stick some tubes on my ears?
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.1.label: Rhino ears
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.1.description: Perfect for healing and cooling you off a bit!
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.2.label: Rhino ears
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosEar.stages.2.description: I'm used to my ears, not these weird tubes...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.0.label: Rhino tail
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.0.description: It's just a useless piece of skin hanging of me...
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.1.label: Rhino tail
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.2.label: Rhino tail
LanguageData.EtherRhinocerosTail.stages.2.description: Why do I even have this...weird tail thing?!
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.0.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.0.description: Baaaaaaaa? I don't really want to eat grass...
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.1.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.1.description: Who needs a lawnmower when you could just do it yourself?
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.2.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.3.label: Sheep face
LanguageData.EtherSheepSnout.stages.3.description: I don't need to be able to cook when I could just eat grass!
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.0.label: Sheep eye
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.1.label: Sheep eye
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.1.description: Nobody can sneak up on me now...!
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.2.label: Sheep eye
LanguageData.EtherSheepEye.stages.2.description: They make me look like a stupid sheep!
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.0.label: Sheep ear
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.0.description: They are really annoying sometimes, blocking my vision flopping around.
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.1.label: Sheep ear
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.2.label: Sheep ear
LanguageData.EtherSheepEar.stages.2.description: I look like I belong in a cage...
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.0.label: Sheep tail
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.1.label: Sheep tail
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.2.label: Sheep tail
LanguageData.EtherSheepTail.stages.2.description: This is too weird for me, but at least I can hide it from people.
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.0.label: Snowy face
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.1.label: Snowy face
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.2.label: Snowy face
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.0.label: Snowy ears
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.0.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad. They're kinda cute, actually.
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.1.label: Snowy ears
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.2.label: Snowy ears
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardEar.stages.2.description: I feel like an anime character...
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.0.label: Snowy tail
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.0.descriptio: Sure, it's fluffy and all, but it kind of gets in the way...
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.1.label: Snowy tail
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.1.descriptio: So big! So fluffy! I love it!
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.2.label: Snowy tail
LanguageData.EtherSnowLeopardTail.stages.2.descriptio: God, this thing is always getting in my way...
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.0.label: Spotted face
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.0.description: It's hard to talk without purring.
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.1.label: Spotted face
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.2.label: Spotted face
LanguageData.EtherLeopardJaw.stages.2.description: No! I don't want to purr!
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.0.label: Leopard ears
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.0.description: As far as things go, these aren't too bad.
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.1.label: Leopard ears
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.2.label: Leopard ears
LanguageData.EtherLeopardEar.stages.2.description: I feel like an anime character...
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.0.label: Spotted tail
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.1.label: Spotted tail
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.1.description: It's not as fluffy as I would have liked, but it's still cool!
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.2.label: Spotted tail
LanguageData.EtherLeopardTail.stages.2.description: This thing has a mind of its own! Get it off me!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.0.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.1.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.1.description: I could eat nuts all day long!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.2.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.3.label: Squirrel face
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelJaw.stages.3.description: I could live off nuts alone...just like in the wild!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.0.label: Squirrel ear
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.0.description: These ears are a little weird, but not too bad.
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.1.label: Squirrel ear
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.1.description: Did I just hear a bird?
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelEar.stages.2.label: Squirrel ear
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.0.label: Squirrel tail
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.0.description: Come on, does it *have* to be this big?
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.1.label: Squirrel tail
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.1.description: I just wanna use this thing as a blanket!
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.2.label: Squirrel tail
LanguageData.EtherSquirrelTail.stages.2.description: What's the point in having such a big tail?
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.0.label: Thrumbo face
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.0.description: A bit messy, I don't exactly like it.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.1.label: Thrumbo face
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.1.description: I go really go for a tree right now!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.2.label: Thrumbo face
LanguageData.EtherThrumboSnout.stages.2.description: Sloppy and gross, I want it off!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.0.label: Thrumbo ear
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.0.description: They're pretty good at hearing, I'll give them that.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.1.label: Thrumbo ear
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.1.description: Wonderful ears for a wonderful creature!
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.2.label: Thrumbo ear
LanguageData.EtherThrumboEar.stages.2.description: They're stupid, and I don't want to have them...
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.0.label: Thrumbo tail
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.0.description: Having a tail is quite strange but it does feel very luxurious.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.1.label: Thrumbo tail
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.1.description: It's so soft and velvety! Who needs a pillow when I have this?
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.2.label: Thrumbo tail
LanguageData.EtherThrumboTail.stages.2.description: I don't care if some think it's majestic, I HATE it.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.0.label: Razor horn
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.0.description: Ouch! This thing is VERY sharp.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.1.label: Razor horn
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.1.description: It's majestic...no wait, it's me that is majestic now.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.2.label: Razor horn
LanguageData.EtherThrumboHorn.stages.2.description: Maybe if I let them cut it off and sell it...maybe they could get some medicine that could undo this...please...
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stages.0.label: Tortoise face
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stages.1.label: Tortoise face
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stages.1.description: I look so wise and ancient!
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stages.2.label: Tortoise face
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseJaw.stages.2.description: I look like I'm 300 years old! I don't want this at all!
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseEar.stages.0.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseEar.stages.0.description: What the, where are my ears?
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseEar.stages.1.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseEar.stages.1.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseEar.stages.2.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseEar.stages.2.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseTail.stages.0.label: Tortoise tail
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseTail.stages.0.description: It's short, stubby, and in the way.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseTail.stages.1.label: Tortoise tail
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseTail.stages.1.description: I can wiggle it, but that's about it.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseTail.stages.2.label: Tortoise tail
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseTail.stages.2.description: I have to cut a hole in my pants for THIS?
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.0.label: Half-shell
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.0.description: Ugh, this thing is pretty awkward. Armored, but heavy.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.1.label: Half-shell
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.1.description: It's heavy, but a natural suit of armor, awesome!
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.2.label: Half-shell
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.2.description: So slow and...heavy...and I can't take it off!
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyJaw.stages.0.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyJaw.stages.0.description: I can't talk properly with this stupid beak!
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyJaw.stages.1.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyJaw.stages.1.description: Time to peck everyone I don't like.
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyJaw.stages.2.label: Beak
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyEar.stages.0.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyEar.stages.0.description: What the, where are my ears?
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyEar.stages.1.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyEar.stages.1.description: I suppose they're more streamlined now?
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyEar.stages.2.label: Ear holes
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyEar.stages.2.description: Hello?! I can't hear you! Speak up, I don't have proper ears now!
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyTail.stages.0.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyTail.stages.0.description: ...does this make my butt look big?
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyTail.stages.1.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyTail.stages.1.description: It's kind of fun to wiggle it.
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyTail.stages.2.label: Tailfeathers
LanguageData.EtherTurkeyTail.stages.2.description: I look like a damn turkey, whyyyy?!
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.0.label: Warg face
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.0.description: These jaws are very strong...I REALLY hope I don't bite my tongue by accident.
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.1.label: Warg face
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.1.description: The bite force of these jaws is incredible! No need for cutlery any more!
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.2.label: Warg face
LanguageData.EtherWargMuzzle.stages.2.description: I look like a rabid beast...
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.0.label: Warg ears
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.0.description: I swear these things move as if they have a mind of their own.
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.1.label: Warg ears
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.1.description: I can hear prey from a mile away!
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.2.label: Warg ears
LanguageData.EtherWargEar.stages.2.description: Theses ears belong on a corpse eating warg...NOT ME.
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.0.label: Warg tail
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.0.description: Damn thing keeps knocking over everything it touches!
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.1.label: Warg tail
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.1.description: This thing is unbelievably strong, I could probably beat someone in an arm wrestle with it!
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.2.label: Warg tail
LanguageData.EtherWargTail.stages.2.description: It's bristly, stiff and has an unnatural amount of muscle in it...disgusting.
LanguageData.EtherArcticWolfMuzzle.stages.0.label: Wolf muzzle
LanguageData.EtherArcticWolfMuzzle.stages.0.descripti: I sound ridiculous trying to speak with this thing.
LanguageData.EtherArcticWolfMuzzle.stages.1.label: Wolf muzzle
LanguageData.EtherArcticWolfMuzzle.stages.1.descripti: So many scents! This is incredible!
LanguageData.EtherArcticWolfMuzzle.stages.2.label: Wolf muzzle
LanguageData.EtherArcticWolfMuzzle.stages.2.descripti: I'm smelling things I wish I couldn't. I want my old face back...
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierJaw.stages.0.label: Yappy face
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierJaw.stages.0.descri: Hair keeps getting in my nose and eyes, its so itchy.
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierJaw.stages.1.label: Yappy face
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierJaw.stages.1.descri: Cute! Admittedly not very practical, though.
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierJaw.stages.2.label: Yappy face
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierJaw.stages.2.descri: I look like a show dog, I feel pathetic.
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierEar.stages.0.label: Yappy ears
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierEar.stages.0.descri: I'm not sure how useful these stubby little ears are.
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierEar.stages.1.label: Yappy ears
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierEar.stages.1.descri: They look cute, and I can hear better than before. A win-win!
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierEar.stages.2.label: Yappy ears
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierTail.stages.0.label: Yappy tail
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierTail.stages.0.descr: It serves no purpose...I'd rather not have it.
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierTail.stages.1.label: Yappy tail
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierTail.stages.1.descr: I'm not sure it has much use but it is adorable.
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierTail.stages.2.label: Yappy tail
LanguageData.EtherYorkshireTerrierTail.stages.2.descr: It's not a tail, it's a mutated tumor sticking out from my spine.
LanguageData.AnimalisticWargMorphAteCorpse.stages.0.d: Ugh, this is disgusting. I don't want to do this...
LanguageData.AnimalisticWargMorphAteCorpse.stages.1.d: Ugh, this isn't the best meal ever...but it's tasty.
LanguageData.AnimalisticWargMorphAteCorpse.stages.2.d: Something wants me to like the taste...and I think I do.
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.0.descr: I had to eat raw food. We should be cooking that kind of food before eating it. We're not animals.
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.1.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.1.descr: It's alright...still gross, but it's more tolerable than before.
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.2.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.2.descr: Hm...it's decent...it's just hard to think normally when I'm eating it...
LanguageData.AnimalisticPawnAteRawFood.stages.3.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.0.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.1.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.1.descriptio: I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.2.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.2.descriptio: I ate animal feed, and it was...alright? That should concern me.
LanguageData.AnimalisticAteKibble.stages.3.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.1.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.2.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.2.descript: Why do I feel weird out and about? Oh! Clothes!
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.3.label: naked
LanguageData.AniamlisticAnimalNaked.stages.4.label: naked
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.0.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.0.descriptio: I'm nude and loving it! I feel so free and unconstrained and in touch with my surroundings!
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.1.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.1.descriptio: Nothin' between me and the world, it's just right.
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.2.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.3.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.3.descriptio: Why would they want to put stuff over their fur...
LanguageData.AnimalisticHappyNude.stages.4.label: happily nude
LanguageData.AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1.de: My head feels weird...it's like a strange voice in the back of my mind.
LanguageData.AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2.de: I think I should just...get on all fours.
LanguageData.AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.3.de: Should I...give in to the thoughts?
LanguageData.MA_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.0: My human mind is as strong as ever!
LanguageData.MA_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1: A gentle tug at my mind, telling me to let go. It's tempting.
LanguageData.MA_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2: I think these mutations are...starting to get the better of my mind.
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.0: My human mind is as strong as ever!
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1: Why do I feel so strange? Like my mind is melting...
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2: These sights and smells are overwhelming and horrid!
LanguageData.BP_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.3: No! I can't...give up now...but this instinct is strong!
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.0: My human mind is as strong as ever...which is boring.
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.1: My senses feel keener, and these animal thoughts are electric!
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.2: Everything is so rich...a new experience...I could get used to this...!
LanguageData.PW_AnimalisticThoughtPersistant.stages.3: Hard to keep my focus...but why should I?
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.0.label: alone
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind, I feel unsafe being all alone.
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.1.label: lonely
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small herd.
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.2.label: comfortable
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.2.description: There's lots of my kind, safety in numbers.
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.3.label: happy
LanguageData.HerdMindedAThought.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my herd, there's nothing to fear!
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.0.label: awful bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.0.descriptio: I had to sleep in an awful room all by myself.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.1.label: dull bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.1.descriptio: I had to sleep in an dull room all by myself.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.2.label: mediocre bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.2.descriptio: I had to sleep in a room all by myself.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.3.label: decent bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.3.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.4.label: slightly impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.4.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own in a slightly impressive bedroom. It was alright.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.5.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.5.descriptio: I slept on my own in an impressive bedroom. It was ok.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.6.label: very impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.6.descriptio: I slept in a very impressive bedroom on my own. It's nice, but I miss my herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.7.descriptio: I slept in an extremely impressive bedroom. It's great, but I wish there were others here.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.8.descriptio: I slept in an unbelievably impressive bedroom. It was marvelous, but I felt something was missing.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBedroom.stages.9.descriptio: I slept in a heavenly bedroom. It was astounding, but it would have been better to share it with the herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.0.label: awful barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.0.descriptio: We had to sleep in an awful barrack, but the herd was there.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.1.label: dull barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.1.descriptio: We had to sleep in a dull barrack. but the rest of the herd was there.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.2.label: mediocre barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.2.descriptio: We slept in a mediocre barrack with my herd. Okay, I guess.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.3.label: decent barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.3.descriptio: We slept in a decent barrack with my herd. This feels nice.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.4.label: slightly impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.4.descriptio: We got to sleep in a pretty nice barrack with the herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.5.label: impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.5.descriptio: We got to sleep in an impressive barrack. I even got to share it with the rest of the herd.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.6.label: very impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.6.descriptio: We slept in a very impressive barrack with the herd. I love it.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.7.label: extremely impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.7.descriptio: We slept in an extremely impressive barrack with the herd. It was marvelous
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.8.descriptio: The barrack we slept in was unbelievably impressive.
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_HerdMindedBarrack.stages.9.descriptio: We slept in a barrack that was simply wondrous.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.0.label: alone
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind, I wish I had a proper pack.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.1.label: lonely
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small pack.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.2.label: comfortable
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.2.description: There's lots of my kind, strength in numbers.
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.3.label: happy
LanguageData.PackMindAThought.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my pack, this is great!
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.0.label: awful bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.0.descriptio: I had to sleep in an awful room all by myself.

LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.1.descriptio: I had to sleep in an dull room all by myself.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.2.label: mediocre bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.2.descriptio: I had to sleep in a room all by myself.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.3.label: decent bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.3.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.4.label: slightly impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.4.descriptio: I had to sleep on my own in a slightly impressive bedroom. It was alright.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.5.label: impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.5.descriptio: I slept on my own in an impressive bedroom. It was ok.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.6.label: very impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.6.descriptio: I slept in a very impressive bedroom on my own. It was nice but I miss my pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.7.descriptio: I slept in an extremely impressive bedroom. It was great but I wish there were others here.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.8.descriptio: I slept in an unbelievably impressive bedroom. It was marvelous but I felt something was missing
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive bedroom
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBedroom.stages.9.descriptio: I slept in a heavenly bedroom. It was astounding, but it would have been better to share it with the pack.

LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.0.descriptio: We had to sleep in an awful barrack, but the pack was there.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.1.label: dull barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.1.descriptio: We had to sleep in a dull barrack. but the rest of the pack was there.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.2.label: mediocre barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.2.descriptio: We slept in a mediocre barrack with my pack. Okay, I guess.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.3.label: decent barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.3.descriptio: We slept in a decent barrack with my pack. This feels nice.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.4.label: slightly impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.4.descriptio: We got to sleep in a pretty nice barrack with the pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.5.label: impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.5.descriptio: We got to sleep in an impressive barrack. I even got to share it with the rest of the pack.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.6.label: very impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.6.descriptio: We slept in a very impressive barrack with the pack. I love it.
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.7.label: extremely impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.7.descriptio: We slept in an extremely impressive barrack with the pack. It was marvelous
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive barrack
LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.8.descriptio: The barrack we slept in was unbelievably impressive.

LanguageData.PM_PackMindedBarrack.stages.9.descriptio: We slept in a barrack that was simply wondrous.
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtDefault.stage: What on earth?! I can hear you...me...us? I need some space.
You, stop thinking about it or we're both going to be in trouble.
C'mon, stop acting like this...I can't think clearly.
You're...making this worse for both of us...we...I need to sleep.
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtMA.stages.0.d: Hey friend, I don't know how you feel about this but I think it's pretty cool.
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtMA.stages.1.d: Hmm...we could get used to this. What, you don't like that 'we'?
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtMA.stages.2.d: Listen to the call of the wild...you'll feel better about this.
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtMA.stages.3.d: My other mind wants to stay focused...but I want to enjoy the instinct...just become 'I'.
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtBP.stages.0.d: This is the worst thing I can imagine, welded to someone else in a freakish body!
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtBP.stages.1.d: Don't think about it! You're making me feel worse!
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtBP.stages.2.d: My other mind...wants to give in...but I can't!
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtPW.stages.0.d: This is...amazing. Hey, second-head, want to be friends?
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtPW.stages.1.d: We're enjoying this feeling...or at least, I think second-head is.
LanguageData.MergedPawnPersistentThoughtPW.stages.2.d: I'm confused, is it 'we' or 'I'? I could use either...
LanguageData.DefaultMorphTfMemory.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.DefaultMorphTfMemory.stages.0.descriptio: Not much seems to be different...
LanguageData.DefaultMorphTfMemory.stages.1.label: changed
LanguageData.DefaultMorphTfMemory.stages.1.descriptio: Wait a minute, those things weren't there before.
LanguageData.DefaultMorphTfMemory.stages.2.label: changed
LanguageData.DefaultMorphTfMemory.stages.2.descriptio: What's happening to me? I barely even look human anymore!
LanguageData.DefaultMorphRevertsToHuman.stages.0.desc: That was...an experience, to say the least. I'm glad to be back to my old self again, though.
LanguageData.BeastmasterThoughts.stages.0.label: {0}'s master
LanguageData.BeastmasterThoughts.stages.0.description: It feels good being with {0}. It's easier, them being an animal.
LanguageData.BeastmasterThoughts.stages.1.label: master of {0}
LanguageData.BeastmasterThoughts.stages.1.description: It's nice to be around animals that understand you.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedMaster.stages.0.label: friend
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedMaster.stages.0.descr: My bonded friend is great, helping me to get used to life like this.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedMaster.stages.1.label: friend
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedMaster.stages.1.descr: My bonded friend is great, even though I can't express it with words.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedMaster.stages.2.label: ...master?
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedMaster.stages.2.descr: My bonded friend...or is it master? Great person...want to be close.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedMaster.stages.3.label: master
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedNonMaster.stages.0.de: I have a special bond with my friend, but they're not by my side.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedNonMaster.stages.1.de: I have a special bond with my friend, but they're not by my side.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalBondedNonMaster.stages.2.de: I think...they're my master...but they're not here.
LanguageData.FeralPillThought.stages.0.label: sapping mind
LanguageData.FeralPillThought.stages.0.description: What was that?! The call of instinct is so much stronger now.
LanguageData.FeralPillThought.stages.1.label: sapping mind
LanguageData.FeralPillThought.stages.1.description: Oh no...it's too strong to ignore, they're taking my mind!
LanguageData.FeralPillThought.stages.2.label: sapping mind
LanguageData.FeralPillThought.stages.2.description: It's hard to keep focused...maybe I should just give in?
LanguageData.FeralPillThought.stages.3.label: sapped
The instinct is getting stronger...I never said I wanted to lose it!
The scents and feelings are hard to ignore...
It's hard to keep focused...maybe I should just give in?
LanguageData.FeralPillThoughtBodyPurist.stages.0.desc: What was that thing?! I feel lightheaded and...NO!
LanguageData.FeralPillThoughtBodyPurist.stages.1.desc: They're taking the last human part of me, you animals! This is hell on earth!
LanguageData.FeralPillThoughtPrimalWish.stages.0.desc: The rush of instinct is amazing! I feel alive!
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.0.label: Ate corpse
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.0.description: Ugh, this is disgusting. I don't want to do this...
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.1.label: Ate corpse
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.1.description: Ugh, this isn't the best meal ever...but it's tasty.
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.2.label: Ate corpse
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.2.description: Something wants me to like the taste...and I think I do.
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.3.label: Ate corpse
LanguageData.WargAteCorpse.stages.4.label: Ate corpse
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteRawFood.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteRawFood.stages.0.descrip: Being an animal doesn't make this taste any more appealing.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteRawFood.stages.1.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteRawFood.stages.1.descrip: It's alright...still gross, but more tolerable than before.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteRawFood.stages.2.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteRawFood.stages.2.descrip: Hm...it's decent...it's just hard to think normally when I'm eating it...
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteRawFood.stages.3.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteKibble.stages.0.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteKibble.stages.0.descript: I had to eat animal feed, now that I'm like this. I still want proper meals!
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteKibble.stages.1.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteKibble.stages.1.descript: I had to eat animal feed, now that I'm like this.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteKibble.stages.2.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteKibble.stages.2.descript: I ate animal feed, and it was...alright? That should concern me...
LanguageData.SapientAnimalAteKibble.stages.3.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.FHDefaultCannibalThought_Direct.stages.0: It's unsettling eating a {animal} raw. That could be me!
LanguageData.FHDefaultCannibalThought_Direct.stages.1: It's pretty good. Wait! I'm a {animal}!
LanguageData.FHDefaultCannibalThought_Direct.stages.2: I'm eating {animal} meat raw, but I'm a {animal}... Does that matter?
LanguageData.FHDefaultCannibalGoodThought_Direct.stag: It's not another person... But I'm a {animal} so it's close enough!
It's pretty good! Oh I'm a {animal} too, that's even better!
I'm eating {animal} meat raw, I'm a {animal}. That's good!
LanguageData.FHDefaultCannibalThought_Ingredient.stag: It's unsettling eating a meal made from {animal} meat. That could be me!
It's pretty good. Wait, this was a {animal} right? This feels so weird.
This was made from a {animal}... I'm a {animal}... Does that matter?
It's not human, but I'm a {animal} so it's close enough! It'd be better raw though.
It's pretty good! Oh it was made with {animal} too, that's even better!
This was a {animal}, I'm a {animal}. Nice.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalHuntingMemory.stages.0.desc: I was so hungry I...can't believe I did that. I'm covered in blood and I want to hide.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalHuntingMemory.stages.1.desc: It's hard to fight off instinct, let alone hunger. I'm bloody, but I'm fed.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalHuntingMemory.stages.2.desc: The taste is starting to grow on me...I think I could keep hunting.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalHuntingMemory.stages.3.desc: Made a kill. Fed. Tastes good.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalHuntingMemoryPrimalWish.sta: I don't want to get that hungry again...but hunting is fun!
Nothing like a good hunt to get the blood flowing.
LanguageData.SapientAnimalHuntingBreakCatharsis.stage: I feel better now...and a little foggier, I guess.
I know I shouldn't, but...I feel so alive!
Getting that out of my system...felt good. And I got fed.
LanguageData.FormerHumanInteractedThought.stages.0.de: Someone took the time to talk to me, telling me everything would be ok. I think I can manage, if they're going to help me cope with this.
LanguageData.FormerHumanInteractedThought.stages.1.de: Even though I couldn't talk back, it was nice to have someone sit and chat with me.
LanguageData.FormerHumanInteractedThought.stages.2.de: Nice of them, but I think I want belly rubs now...
LanguageData.FormerHumanInteractedThought.stages.3.de: Talking at me...what are they saying?
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.0.label: trained
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.0.descrip: They're trying to train me like an animal! I don't need your handouts!
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.1.label: trained
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.1.descrip: I suppose it's not all bad, at least I get treats...but also, how dare you.
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.2.label: trained
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.2.descrip: I'd better get used to this...at least there's food involved.
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.3.label: trained
LanguageData.FormerHumanTrainThought.stages.3.descrip: Treat! I'll do tricks for treats...
LanguageData.FormerHumanTameThought.stages.0.label: "Tamed"
LanguageData.FormerHumanTameThought.stages.0.descript: I can talk, you know. You don't need to be condescending if you want me to stick around.
LanguageData.FormerHumanTameThought.stages.1.label: "Tamed"
LanguageData.FormerHumanTameThought.stages.1.descript: Thanks for the snack, but keep your hands off me.
LanguageData.FormerHumanTameThought.stages.2.label: tamed
LanguageData.FormerHumanTameThought.stages.3.label: tamed
LanguageData.SapientAnimalNaked.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.SapientAnimalNaked.stages.0.description: I know I'm covered in fur but...c'mon!
LanguageData.SapientAnimalNaked.stages.1.label: naked
LanguageData.SapientAnimalNaked.stages.1.description: It would help if I could put something on, even just to pretend...
LanguageData.SapientAnimalNaked.stages.2.label: naked
LanguageData.SapientAnimalNaked.stages.2.description: Why do I feel weird out and about? Oh! Clothes!

LanguageData.NudistSapientAnimalNaked.stages.0.label: happily nude
LanguageData.NudistSapientAnimalNaked.stages.0.descri: Eh, I'm covered in fur, I don't care. This is more natural!
LanguageData.NudistSapientAnimalNaked.stages.1.label: happily nude
LanguageData.NudistSapientAnimalNaked.stages.1.descri: Nothin' between me and the world, it's just right.
LanguageData.NudistSapientAnimalNaked.stages.2.label: happily nude
LanguageData.NudistSapientAnimalNaked.stages.3.label: happily nude
LanguageData.NudistSapientAnimalNaked.stages.3.descri: Why would they want to put stuff over their fur...

LanguageData.FormerHumanAnimalPalsThought.stages.0.de: I never thought I'd share the perspective of my bonded animal.
LanguageData.FormerHumanAnimalPalsThought.stages.1.de: They're an animal like me, but I'm glad they still recognise me for me...
LanguageData.FormerHumanAnimalPalsThought.stages.2.de: Animal friend...my friend. We're closer like this...
LanguageData.FormerHumanPalsThought.stages.0.label: former human pal
LanguageData.FormerHumanPalsThought.stages.0.descript: I'm in the same boat as them now, though I never thought it'd happen...
LanguageData.FormerHumanPalsThought.stages.1.label: former human pal
LanguageData.FormerHumanPalsThought.stages.1.descript: Both of us being like this makes our bond stronger.
LanguageData.FormerHumanPalsThought.stages.2.label: former human pal
LanguageData.FormerHumanPalsThought.stages.2.descript: We'll both figure out...how to live like...this...before we both eventually turn feral...
LanguageData.FormerHumanPalsThought.stages.3.label: former human pal
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtDefault.stages.0.des: I can hardly believe my eyes. I'm a goddamn animal!
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtDefault.stages.1.des: Something's tugging at my mind...it's the animal.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtDefault.stages.2.des: I shouldn't give in but it's...getting cloudy in here.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtDefault.stages.3.des: Gotta...stay...focused. All I want to do is eat and sleep!
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.0.descript: This is a little bit more extreme than I wanted, but ok.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.1.label: lingering instinct
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.1.descript: Hmm...I could get used feeling like an animal.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.2.label: conflicted mind
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.2.descript: The call of the wild is getting stronger...and I don't really mind it.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.3.label: hard to think...
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.3.descript: I should stay focused, but...I'm comfortable like this.
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtMA.stages.4.label: feral animal
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.0.label: changed
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.0.descript: This is not what I wanted at all, for the love of all that is good, please, someone turn me back!
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.1.label: lingering instinct
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.1.descript: I need to stay strong, but it's difficult when every sense is overwhelmed!
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.2.label: conflicted mind
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.2.descript: No, god, no...the animal in my mind is taking over...getting foggy in here...
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.3.label: hard to think...
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtBP.stages.4.label: feral animal
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.0.label: primal wish fulfilled
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.0.descript: I got exactly what I wanted. Now, when does the instinct kick in?
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.1.label: lingering instinct
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.1.descript: Hmm, all these sights and smells from a different viewpoint is extremely interesting!
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.2.label: conflicted mind
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.2.descript: Wow, this uh...this instinct is getting strong. I think I'm still ok with it...
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.3.label: hard to think...
LanguageData.FH_PersistentThoughtPW.stages.4.label: feral animal
LanguageData.SapientAnimalSleptOnGround.stages.0.desc: I don't even have a pillow anymore, I have to sleep on the ground!
LanguageData.SapientAnimalMilked.stages.0.label: milked
LanguageData.SapientAnimalMilked.stages.0.description: Get your hands off me you damn dirty ape!
LanguageData.SapientAnimalGotSomeSnuggling.stages.0.d: There's nothing like a good snuggle to lift the mood.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.0.label: alone
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind, I feel unsafe being all alone.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.1.label: lonely
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small herd.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.2.label: comfortable
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.2.description: There's lots of my kind, safety in numbers.
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.3.label: happy
LanguageData.HerdMinded.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my herd, there's nothing to fear!
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.0.label: alone
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.0.description: I'm the only one of my kind, I wish I had a proper pack.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.1.label: lonely
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.1.description: There's another like me, but we're still only a small pack.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.2.label: comfortable
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.2.description: There's lots of my kind, strength in numbers.
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.3.label: happy
LanguageData.PackMinded.stages.3.description: There's plenty of people in my pack, this is great!
